mapper.sql: wid.id, wid.order_no, wid.line_no,wid.status,wid.supplier_code, wid.sku_code, wid.inbound_pre_num,wid.inbound_num, wid.inbound_price, wid.cost, wid.plan_loc,wid.is_created_voucher,wid.voucher_no,wid.is_cross_dock, wid.remark, wid.creator, wid.create_time, wid.modifier, wid.modify_time, wid.rec_ver, wid.company_id, wid.warehouse_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO wm_inbound_detail (id, order_no, line_no,status,supplier_code,sku_code, inbound_pre_num,inbound_num, inbound_price, cost, plan_loc,is_created_voucher,voucher_no,is_cross_dock,remark, creator, create_time, modifier, modify_time, rec_ver, company_id, warehouse_id) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.orderNo},#{item.lineNo},#{item.status}, #{item.supplierCode},#{item.skuCode},#{item.inboundPreNum},#{item.inboundNum},#{item.inboundPrice},#{item.cost},#{item.planLoc},#{item.isCreatedVoucher},#{item.voucherNo},#{item.isCrossDock}, #{item.remark},#{item.creator},#{item.createTime}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.modifyTime}, #{item.recVer}, #{item.companyId},#{item.warehouseId})
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM wm_inbound_detail WHERE id in
#{item}
mapper.select:
select
,bc.customer_name as supplier_name, bfs.fitting_sku_name, bfs.model_code, bfs.quick_code from wm_inbound_detail wid left join bd_customer bc on bc.customer_code = wid.supplier_code and bc.company_id = wid.company_id LEFT JOIN bd_fitting_sku bfs ON wid.sku_code = bfs.fitting_sku_code and wid.company_id = bfs.company_id

SELECT bfs.fitting_sku_name, bfs.model_code, wid.sku_code, wid.supplier_code, bc.customer_name, wid.modify_time, wid.inbound_num, wid.inbound_price FROM wm_inbound_detail wid LEFT JOIN bd_fitting_sku bfs ON bfs.company_id = wid.company_id AND bfs.fitting_sku_code = wid.sku_code LEFT JOIN bd_customer bc ON bc.customer_code = wid.supplier_code AND bc.company_id = wid.company_id WHERE 1=1 and wid.status = '20' and wid.supplier_code = #{supplierCode} AND bfs.fitting_sku_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${fittingSkuName}','%') AND bfs.model_code LIKE CONCAT('%','${modelCode}','%') AND bfs.fitting_type_code = #{fittingTypeCode} and wod.sku_code = #{fittingSkuCode} AND wid.modify_time >= #{orderTimeFm} AND wid.modify_time <= #{orderTimeTo} and wid.company_id = #{companyId} and wid.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId} order by wid.supplier_code,wid.sku_code,wid.modify_time
